question: 1.ææææ Do you agree that one country should be the foundation of two systems and if they come to contradiction, one country should be placed above two systems?
2.ææææ Do you agree that Hong Kong should remain completely politically independent and separate from mainland, China?
3.ææææ Do you agree that as long as we donÍt commit crimes, we should not be worried about official surveillance?
4.ææææ Do you agree our civil liberty is being excessively curbed in the name of security?
5.ææææ Do you agree with legislation of bill 23 for the purpose of national security?
6.ææææ Do you agree that illegal immigrants should be given access to government subsidy/financial support?
7.ææææ Do you agree that children of illegal immigrants should be granted citizenship?
8.ææææ Do you agree that foreign helpers have the right to apply for citizenship in Hong Kong?
9.ææææ Do you support the legalization of same sex marriage?
10.æ Do you think a same sex couple should not be excluded from the possibility of child adoption?
11.æ Do you agree with occupy central movement?
12.æ Do you support the constitutional reform bill proposed by the government?
13.æ Do you agree that the Chinese Communist Party should be the only legitimate party in power?
14.æ Do you agree that there should be official ceremony to commemorate the ñJune 4th Incidentî?
15.æ Do you agree with any amendment of the Basic Law?
16.æ Do you agree that ñHong Kong peopleî are not the same as Chinese people?
17.æ Do you support CY LeungÍs administrative role?
18.æ Do you support implementation of moral and national education?
19.æ Do you agree that the press should to some extent be under government monitoring and control?
20.æ Do you agree that the number of mainland visitors should be reduced?
21.æ Do you agree that Hong Kong government should subsidize to provide for more private health care?
22.æ Do you agree that the economic progress/reform of China is indispensable to Hong KongÍs economic development?
23.æ Do you agree that universities should increase the number of places so that more young people can get degrees?
24.æ Do you agree that civic nomination is the most suitable scheme to implement universal suffrage in Hong Kong?
25.æ Do you agree that the government should promote the development of sports professionalism?
26.æ Do you agree that Hong Kong should remain a free market economy?

27.æ Do you agree that the interest of the SMEs should be protected under competition law? Do you agree that genuine free market requires restrictions on the ability of predator multinationals to create monopolies?
28.æ Should Hong Kong reduce corporate income tax rates?
29.æ Do you agree controlling inflation is more important than controlling unemployment?
30.æ Do you support the development of the third runway in Hong Kong?
31.æ Should the government legislate a law to fix the minimum wage?
32.æ Do you agree the wealth should be taxed more? // do you think the rich is too highly taxed? "From each according to his ability, to each according to his need" is a fundamentally good idea.
33.æ Do you agree that corporations cannot be trusted to voluntarily protect the environment and they require regulation?
34.æ Do you agree that above all things, a company should prioritize delivering a profit to its shareholders?
35.æ Do you agree that the government should be expected to protect any cultural remains even if they that cannot survive on a commercial basis?
36.æ Do you support the development of West Kowloon Cultural District?
37.æ Do you agree that the government should suppress the growth of home prices?
38.æ Do you agree that severance payments and long service payments should be deducted from accrued benefits of the MPF schemes?
39.æ Do you agree with the view that Hong Kong does not have enough tourist attractions?
40.æ Do you agree with MTRÍs Fare Adjustment Mechanism?
41.æ Do you agree that those with the ability to pay should have the right to higher standards of medical care?
42.æ Do you agree that those who are able to work, and refuse the opportunity, should not expect society's support?
43.æ Do you support legislation of law to ensure standard working hours?
44.æ Do you agree that those with the ability to pay should have the right to higher quality of education?
45.æ Do you agree that the prime function of schooling should be to equip the future generation to find jobs?
46.æ Do you agree that the government should encourage and help young people to start up their own businesses?
47.æ Do you agree that fiscal reserves of the Government should be given out to the general public?
48.æ Do you agree that land on the edges of the country parks should be developed for housing?
49.æ Do you agree that Hong Kong dollar should continue to be linked to the US dollar?
50.æ Do you support the forming of Innovation and Technology Bureau?
